sentences.sContent: Without the right date stamped on it, your ticket will be invalid.
sentences.sCn: 票上若没有加盖正确日期就是废票。

remMethod.val: in(无)+val(强壮的)+id→不强壮的→有病的

trans.tranCn: 有病的； 伤残的；供病人用的 A；无效的； 作废的；无根据的， 站不住脚的
trans.tranOther: a contract, ticket, claim etc that is invalid is not legally or officially acceptable

trans.tranCn: 病人， 病弱者； 伤残人 A
trans.tranOther: someone who cannot look after themselves because of illness, old age, or injury
